U Gotta pose on ur holiday to make sure u got enough instagram ready pictures when ur back !!! 😛😛😛 #milan #letsgoback #throwbackthursday #poserforlife✌️
A post shared by Arjun Kapoor (@arjunkapoor) on Jan 17, 2019 at 4:08am PST
title: Arjun Kapoor’s ‘Dil Goes Hmmm’ After Malaika Arora Posts ‘Take Me Back’ To Vacay On Instagram
description: Since a long time, gossip mills have been churning out stories that Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora are in love and are planning to get married soon. They have often been spotted together on dinner dates. Of course, that set the tongues wagging. If rumours are to be believed Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora were on a vacation to Milan.
